actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Paul G. Finnerty and Nancy Finnerty of Scranton, Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Deems any pay received by a named person for service performed during a specified period by reason of such person's employment with the Department of Defense at the Tobyhanna Army Depot to be compensation, for purposes of annuity compensation under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Paul G. Finnerty and Nancy Finnerty of Scranton, Pennsylvania.
